texts.name: Metallion Asurastar
texts.desc:
"Imaginary Actor" + "Sword Dancer"

[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Multi-Choice Effect]:
● Choose 1 face-down card your opponent controls, and destroy it.
● Choose 1 face-up monster (Cyborg) you control, and it gains ATK equal to [the total ATK of all face-up monsters (Warrior) your opponent currently controls] until the end of this turn.
texts.str2: 1 Cyborg gain ATK equal to the total ATK of all face-up Warriors your opponent controls

texts.name: Metallion Vritrastar
texts.desc:
"Imaginary Actor" + "Serpainter"

[Requirement]: None
[Multi-Choice Effect]: 
● Choose 1 monster your opponent controls, and change it to face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position.
● Choose face-up monsters (Dragon) your opponent controls, up to [the number of face-up monsters (Cyborg) you control], and destroy them.
texts.str1: Change 1 monster your opponent control to face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position

texts.name: Metallion Eraclestar
texts.desc:
"Imaginary Actor" + "Magic Juggler"

[Requirement]: You can place 1 card from your GY on the bottom of the Deck.
[Multi-Choice Effect]:
● Choose up to 3 monsters in your opponent's GY, and shuffle them into the Deck.
● Choose up to 2 face-up monsters (Spellcaster) your opponent controls, and shuffle them into the Deck.
texts.str1: Shuffle up to 3 monster in your opponent's GY and shuffle them into the deck
texts.str2: Shuffle up to 2 Spellcaster your opponent control into the deck

texts.name: Metallion Ladonstar
texts.desc:
"Imaginary Actor" + "Gracesaurus"

[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Multi-Choice Effect]:
● Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and it loses 1500 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.
● All face-up monsters (Dinosaur) your opponent currently controls lose 2000 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.
texts.str1: Make 1 Monster your opponent control lose 1500 ATK/DEF
texts.str2: All Dinosaurs your opponent controls lose 2000 ATK/DEF

texts.name: Fire Jester
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Level 5 or higher LIGHT), you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 8 or lower) your opponent controls, and it loses 500 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Imaginary Actor
texts.desc: A mechanical doll incapable of expressing emotions outside of laughing. It uses the emotions of its audience as energy.

texts.name: Gracesaurus
texts.desc: A gentle dinosaur that doesn't like conflict. It's always gracefully watching the audience.

texts.name: Serpainter
texts.desc: A beautiful dragon that once lived in a clear and pure watering hole. Now it serves as the popular mascot of the circus, adored by the audience.

texts.name: Sword Dancer
texts.desc: A master swordsman that used to serve a great nation. He controls his flying swords with great precision as the audience watches attentively.

texts.name: Magic Juggler
texts.desc: A very mysterious man who doesn't spell about his past. He captures the attention of the audience by manipulating his baton almost as if it were magic.

texts.name: Imaginary Ark Tower
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Activate this card if you have a Normal Monster (LIGHT with 500 DEF) in your GY.
[Effect]: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, all face-up monsters (non-LIGHT) on the field lose 300 ATK, also face-up monsters (Level 9 LIGHT) on the field cannot be destroyed by Trap effects.

texts.name: Imaginary Ark Turbulence
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, and you have a Normal Monster (LIGHT with 500 DEF) in your GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Attack Position monster (Level 8 or higher LIGHT) you control, and change it to face-up Defense Position, then you can choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with the same Type as a Normal Monster in your GY, and destroy it.
texts.str1: Destroy 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with the same Type as a Normal Monster in your GY?

texts.name: Imaginary Ark Turnback
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your Attack Position monster (LIGHT) is destroyed by an opponent's attacking monster.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Cyborg) or 1 Normal Monster (LIGHT with 500 DEF) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up.

texts.name: Sevens Paladin the Magical Knight
texts.desc:
"Sevens Road Magician" + "Roadstar Swordsman"

[Requirement]
You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Multi-Choice Effect]
● This card gains 400 ATK [for each different Attribute in the GYs] until the end of this turn.
● Choose 1 monster in your GY, and shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
texts.str1: This card gains 400 ATK for each different Attribute in the GYs until the end of this turn.
texts.str2: Choose 1 monster in your GY, and shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card.

texts.name: Whispark Fairy Girl
texts.desc:
"Sparkhearts Girl" + "Whispering Fairy"

[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose up to 2 monsters in your opponent's GY, and shuffle them into the Deck, then you can make all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls lose 500 ATK until the end of this turn.
texts.str1: Decrease the ATK of all your opponent's monsters by 500?

texts.name: Stray Familia
texts.desc:
"Stray Familiar" + "Stray Familiar"

[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Choose 1 Normal Monster (Spellcaster) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up. Then, if you Special Summoned "Stray Familiar" by this effect, this card gains 1400 ATK until the end of this turn.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Spellcaster Normal Monster from your GY

texts.name: Kuribottorero
texts.desc:
"Kuribott" + "Siesta Torero"

[Requirement]: You can pay 500 LP.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls, and return it to the hand.

texts.name: Kuribott
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters, you can pay 500 LP.
[Effect]: Add 1 "Kuribott" from your GY to your hand.

texts.name: Mr. Alche
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters, you can send this face-up card you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 "Stray Familiar" in your GY, and add it to your hand, then you can draw 1 card. If you drew by this effect, you cannot attack with monsters (Level 6 or lower) this turn.

texts.name: Roadstar Swordsman
texts.desc: A swordsman of the shooting stars with unknown powers, capable of cutting forth a miraculous path.

texts.name: Superstrike Dragon Dragiastar F
texts.desc:
"Dragias the Striking Dragon" + "The☆Dragon"

[Requirement]
If all monsters in your GY are High Dragon and/or Dragon monsters, you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Multi-Choice Effect]
● This turn, this card gains 900 ATK, also it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters.
● This turn, this card can make a second attack, also it inflicts piercing battle damage.
texts.str1: This turn, this card gains 900 ATK, also it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters.
texts.str2: This turn, this card can make a second attack, also it inflicts piercing battle damage.

texts.name: Dragon's Kickbase Master
texts.desc:
"Dragon's Upsetter" + "Dragon's Striker"

[Requirement]: You can shuffle 1 "Dragon's Setupper" or "Dragon's Defender" from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls, and destroy it.

texts.name: The☆Wyvern
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Normal Monster (Level 6 or lower Dragon) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up.

texts.name: The☆Dragon
texts.desc: The dragon of justice signaling supernova clashes! Its name is The☆Dragon!

texts.name: Amusi Howling Performer
texts.desc:
"Amusi Performer" + "Howling Bird"

[Requirement]: You can place 1 "Amusi Performer" or "Howling Bird" from your GY on the bottom of the Deck.
[Effect]: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Kengo Shogun of the Crescent Moon
texts.desc:
"Masaki the Legendary Samurai General" + "Hero of the Yeast"

[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This turn, this card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap effects.
texts.str1: Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap cards

texts.name: Fearstute Followl
texts.desc:
"Followl of the Fornether" + "Followl of Wisdoom"

[Requirement]: During your Main Phase in which this card was Fusion Summoned.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Fiend) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Fiend from your GY

texts.name: Permylind Hicrotron
texts.desc:
"Femtron" + "Cycliptron"

[Requirement]: If you have 3 or more Effect Monsters (Cyberse) in your GY.
[Effect]: Draw 2 cards, then choose 1 card in your hand, and place it on the bottom of the Deck.
texts.str1: Draw 2 cards and place 1 card in your hand on the bottom of the Deck.

texts.name: Winged Celestial Dragon of Weal and Woe
texts.desc:
"Coiled Dragon of Fertility" + "Coiled Dragon of Destruction"

[Requirement]: You can shuffle 1 monster (Wyrm) from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY. Then, if you sent a Spell to the GY by this effect, you can choose up to 2 Field Spells in your GY, and add them to your hand.
texts.str1: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY
texts.str2: Add up to 2 Field Spell from your GY to your hand?

texts.name: Hyper Upstart King Rex
texts.desc:
"Super King Rex" + "Upstart King Rex"

[Requirement]: You can place 1 monster (Dinosaur) from your GY on the top or bottom of the Deck.
[Effect]: This card gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Upstart Goblin" in your GY, you can choose 1 Spell in your GY, and add it to your hand.
texts.str1: Add 1 Spell from your GY to your hand?

texts.name: Star Restart
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Normal Monster (Level 5 or lower) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up, then you can choose 1 "Fusion" in your GY, and add it to your hand.
texts.str1: Add 1 "Fusion" in your GY to your hand?

texts.name: Yami (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, all face-up monsters (Fiend and Spellcaster) on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all face-up monsters (Fairy) on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

texts.name: Fusion
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Fusion Summon by sending face-up monsters you control to the GY as material.

texts.name: Fusion
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Fusion Summon by sending face-up monsters you control to the GY as material.

texts.name: The☆Star Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This card loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and it loses 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Nightbringer Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate by sending the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[Effect]: Your opponent draws 2 cards. Then, inflict 100 damage to your opponent x [The number of cards in your opponent’s hand].
